items.name: iPhone
items.description:
The TrueDepth camera system has all the latest features from the back cameras

Take your selfies to a new stratosphere with Cinematic mode and Photographic Styles

SharePlay lets you and your friends watch movies, listen to music, or share your screens in FaceTime video calls

A15 Bionic and the TrueDepth camera power Face ID, the most secure facial authentication in a smartphone

items.name: Samsung S20
items.description:
Einen herzlichen Applaus für das Galaxy S21 FE 5G, das neueste Mitglied der Galaxy S21-Serie 5G.

Wir haben deine Favoriten kombiniert, und ein beeindruckendes, von Fans inspiriertes Telefon gebaut, damit du Alltag und Hobby genießen kannst.

Einer der schnellsten Chipsätze? Abgehakt. Hochwertige Kamera? Alles klar.

Und die Menge tobt.

Die Fan Edition ist zurück.

items.name: iPad
items.description: With the incredible versatility of iPad Air, you can work any way you want. Use the Smart Keyboard Folio, or attach the Magic Keyboard for responsive typing and a built‑in trackpad.1 It’s perfect for the things you need to do, like sending an email. Or the things you want to do, like writing a short story. And with all‑day battery life,2 iPad Air is ready to work for as long as you need it.

items.name: Washing Machine
items.description: A washing machine (laundry machine, clothes washer, washer, or simply wash) is a home appliance used to wash laundry. The term is mostly applied to machines that use water as opposed to dry cleaning (which uses alternative cleaning fluids and is performed by specialist businesses) or ultrasonic cleaners. The user adds laundry detergent, which is sold in liquid or powder form, to the wash water.

items.name: KitchenAid
items.description: Whether you need 9 dozen of your signature chocolate chips cookies or several pounds of shredded chicken for Taco Tuesday, the KitchenAid® Artisan® Series Tilt-Head Stand Mixer with Premium Accessory Pack has the capacity and tools for every occasion. This model includes both a 3 and 5 quart bowl, so you can do more - mix up batter in one and then whip up a silky frosting in the other. In addition, the exclusive accessory pack includes a flex edge beater, pastry beater, dough hook, wire whip and redesigned secure fit pouring shield. This durable tilt-head stand mixer was built to take it all on, and features 10 speeds to gently knead, thoroughly mix and whip ingredients for a wide variety of recipes.

items.name: Pizza Oven
items.description: Speziell für diejenigen entwickelt, die kein Holz verwenden können oder möchten, aber trotzdem eine perfekte Pizza zaubern wollen. Der Etna 2 ist sehr mobil und Sie können auf der Terrasse oder untern freiem Himmel Pizza backen.
